synopsis.text: Angelise is the first princess of the Misurugi Empire, a powerful kingdom that has achieved peace and prosperity through 'Mana' - an advanced information technology that grants abilities similar to magic. However, Angelise discovers she is a 'Norma' - someone unable to use Mana. Norma are outcasts and oppressed in society. Stripped of her title and rights, Angelise is exiled to a remote island occupied by Norma women forced into military conscription. There she joins the Norma in piloting giant robots called 'Para-mails' to fight off invading DRAGONs - mysterious and destructive beasts from another dimension. Once an innocent princess, Angelise must now find the strength and purpose to survive in her harsh new reality. What she discovers about the true nature of the DRAGONs will shake the foundations of her world. In the midst of betrayal and persecution, can Angelise reclaim her wings?
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
